kv20.5:1.3: Nanu aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vutto bhagavatā, seyyathidaṁ—
kv20.5:1.6: Hañci aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vutto bhagavatā, seyyathidaṁ—
kv20.5:1.7: sammādiṭṭhi …pe… sammāsamādhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv20.5:5.1: Sammāvācā maggaṅgaṁ, sā ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:5.3: Sammādiṭṭhi maggaṅgaṁ, sā ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:5.5: sammāvācā maggaṅgaṁ, sā ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:5.10: sammāsamādhi maggaṅgaṁ, so ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:6.2: sammāājīvo maggaṅgaṁ, so ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:6.4: sammādiṭṭhi …pe… sammāsamādhi maggaṅgaṁ, so ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:9.4: “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho hoti;
kv20.5:9.5: evamassāyaṁ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchatī”ti.
kv20.5:10.4: “yasmiṁ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo na upalabbhati, samaṇopi tattha na upalabbhati, dutiyopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati, tatiyopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati, catutthopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati.
kv20.5:10.5: Yasmiñca kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati, samaṇopi tattha upalabbhati, dutiyopi …pe… tatiyopi …pe… catutthopi tattha samaṇo upalabbhati.
kv20.5:10.6: Imasmiṁ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati. Idheva, subhadda, samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo, idha tatiyo samaṇo, idha catuttho samaṇo. Suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī”ti.
